languages.text: "Возможно, я ошибся, и это не моя кузина следует за тобой, а ты прислуживаешь ей? Зачем мон-кай знать о судьбе тех, кого вы называете "ксеносами"? Разве вы не почитаете их — нас — за смертельных врагов?"

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, я ошибся, и это не моя кузина следует за тобой, а ты прислуживаешь ей? Зачем мон-кай знать о судьбе тех, кого вы называете "ксеносами"? Разве вы не почитаете их — нас — за смертельных врагов?"

languages.text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"
languages.original_text: "Возможно, я ошибся, и это не моя кузина следует за тобой, а ты прислуживаешь ей? Зачем мон-кай знать о судьбе тех, кого вы называете "ксеносами"? Разве вы не почитаете их — нас — за смертельных врагов?"

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my kin who follows you — perhaps you serve her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

"Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my kin who follows you — perhaps you serve her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

"Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

"Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

"Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

languages.text: “或许是我搞错了。或许，并不是我在方舟世界的表妹在追随你，而是你在服侍她？否则，区区一个猴子，为什么要在乎你们称之为‘异形’的命运？难道你不觉得他们——我们——是你们的死敌吗？”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

traits.locale_text: “或许是我搞错了。或许，并不是我在方舟世界的表妹在追随你，而是你在服侍她？否则，区区一个猴子，为什么要在乎你们称之为‘异形’的命运？难道你不觉得他们——我们——是你们的死敌吗？”

languages.text: «Tal vez me equivoque y no sea mi prima de mundo astronave la que te sigue, sino que tal vez la sirvas tú a ella. ¿Por qué iba un{mf||a} mon-keigh a preocuparse por el destino de aquellos a los que llama xenos? ¿Acaso no nos consideras enemigos mortales?».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez me equivoque y no sea mi prima de mundo astronave la que te sigue, sino que tal vez la sirvas tú a ella. ¿Por qué iba un{mf||a} mon-keigh a preocuparse por el destino de aquellos a los que llama xenos? ¿Acaso no nos consideras enemigos mortales?».

languages.text: 「誤解してたな、お前にくっついてるのは俺の方舟の一族じゃないぞ…もしかして、お前がそいつに従ってるのか？モン＝ケイが、異種族呼ばわりしてる相手の運命に首を突っこむのはどういうことだ？お前たちにとって奴らは…俺たちは、怨敵じゃなかったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

traits.locale_text: 「誤解してたな、お前にくっついてるのは俺の方舟の一族じゃないぞ…もしかして、お前がそいつに従ってるのか？モン＝ケイが、異種族呼ばわりしてる相手の運命に首を突っこむのはどういうことだ？お前たちにとって奴らは…俺たちは、怨敵じゃなかったのか？」

languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

languages.text: « Je me trompais peut-être en pensant que ma cousine du vaisseau-monde vous suivait... Serait-ce plutôt vous qui êtes à son service ? Autrement, pourquoi {mf|un|une} mon-keigh s'inquiéterait-{mf|il|elle} du sort de ceux que vous appelez des xénos ? Ne nous considérez-vous pas comme vos ennemis jurés ? »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

traits.locale_text: « Je me trompais peut-être en pensant que ma cousine du vaisseau-monde vous suivait... Serait-ce plutôt vous qui êtes à son service ? Autrement, pourquoi {mf|un|une} mon-keigh s'inquiéterait-{mf|il|elle} du sort de ceux que vous appelez des xénos ? Ne nous considérez-vous pas comme vos ennemis jurés ? »

languages.text: "Vielleicht habe ich mich geirrt, und es ist gar nicht meine Weltenschiff-Base, die Euch folgt – vielleicht dient Ihr vielmehr ihr? Warum sollte sich ein Chem-Pan-Sey mit dem Schicksal derer befassen, die Ihr Xenos nennt? Sind sie – wir – denn nicht Eure Todfeinde?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habe ich mich geirrt, und es ist gar nicht meine Weltenschiff-Base, die Euch folgt – vielleicht dient Ihr vielmehr ihr? Warum sollte sich ein Chem-Pan-Sey mit dem Schicksal derer befassen, die Ihr Xenos nennt? Sind sie – wir – denn nicht Eure Todfeinde?"

languages.text: "Belki de yanılmışımdır. Gemidünyadan soydaşım aslında seni takip etmiyordur. Belki de sen ona hizmet ediyorsundur. Bir mon-keigh, zeno dediğiniz yaratıkların kaderlerine ne diye müdahil olsun ki? Biz azılı düşmanlarınız değil miydik?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was mistaken, and it is not my craftworld cousin who follows you — perhaps it is you who serves her? Why would a mon-keigh concern {mf|himself|herself} with the fate of those you call xenos? Do you not consider them — us — your mortal enemies?"

traits.locale_text: "Belki de yanılmışımdır. Gemidünyadan soydaşım aslında seni takip etmiyordur. Belki de sen ona hizmet ediyorsundur. Bir mon-keigh, zeno dediğiniz yaratıkların kaderlerine ne diye müdahil olsun ki? Biz azılı düşmanlarınız değil miydik?"
